Function Documentation

char getAsciFromScancode ( unsigned char  sc,
uint32  flags 
)

This function converts a scancode from the keyboard into a ASCI character.

Parameters:
unsigned char sc, the scancode. uint32 flags, the flags supplied with the scancode (Uppercase, Shifted, Etc)
Returns:
ASCI Character from the scan code if found.
